snippet: The Coyotes, dogged by financial problems and plagued with low attendance, are in the Western Conference finals after having made the playoffs for the third consecutive season.
abstract: Phoenix Coyotes, dogged by financial problems and plagued with low attendance, are in the Western Conference finals after having made the playoffs for the third consecutive season.
lead_paragraph: The Coyotes, dogged by financial problems and plagued with low attendance, are in the Western Conference finals after having made the playoffs for the third consecutive season.

headline.seo: 2012 Stanley Cup: Troubled Coyotes Are in Western Finals
